channel.title: Oklahoma County on OJO
channel.description: Recent content in Oklahoma County on OJO

item.title: Data Deep Dive: Oklahoma County Detention Center
item.description: “Data Deep Dive” posts provide a broad overview of a particular dataset, policy area, or problem. This one covers Open Justice Oklahoma’s Oklahoma county jail data, which includes information on the population, bookings, releases, etc. at the Oklahoma County Detention Center (OCDC) in Oklahoma City, Oklahoma. 1. The Oklahoma County Detention Center # Located in Oklahoma City, the Oklahoma County Detention Center (OCDC) is the biggest jail in the state.

item.title: Stat Spotlight: Homelessness in Local Jails
item.description: Data from the Oklahoma County Detention Center sheds light on the issue of homelessness among incarcerated people in Oklahoma.
